name: B Orthodontics
description: Family practice led by Dr. Bhavnani. Known for a genuinely friendly vibe and not pushing unnecessary treatment. Great with nervous kids.
fullDescription: Dr. Bhavnani and the team at B Orthodontics have built a reputation for patient-centered care in Yorba Linda. Whether you're considering traditional braces or Invisalign, they take the time to explain all options without pressure tactics.

name: Potter Orthodontics
description: Two convenient locations. Solid reputation for efficient appointments—you won't spend your whole afternoon in the waiting room.

name: Gire Orthodontics
description: Board-certified with a focus on keeping costs reasonable. Transparent pricing—no surprise fees after you've already committed.

name: Yorba Linda Smiles
description: Full-service dental and ortho under one roof. Convenient if you want to consolidate. Modern tech including same-day CEREC.

name: Yorba Linda Dental Group
description: Another combined dental/ortho option. Part of a larger group, so availability is usually good. Accepts most insurance.

name: The Hills Orthodontics
description: Smaller practice with a personal touch. If you prefer knowing your orthodontist by name rather than being shuffled between staff.
